reports.query:
# üçú Map of Flavors (Carte des Saveurs)
### Connecting the World Through Ingredients üåé

reports.title: Ingredient‚ÄìBrand Network for Selected Cuisine
Most Frequently Used Ingredients Across All Cuisines
reports.query:
MATCH (c:Cuisine)-[:HAS_DISH]->(:Dish)-[:USES]->(i:Ingredient)
RETURN i.name AS Ingredient, COUNT(*) AS TotalOccurrences
ORDER BY TotalOccurrences DESC
LIMIT 10;

reports.title: Distribution of Dishes Across Regions
Total Unique Ingredients by Cuisine
Top 10 Most Common Brands Across Recipes
reports.query:
MATCH (i:Ingredient)-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]->(b:Brand)
RETURN b.name AS Brand,
       COUNT(DISTINCT i) AS TotalIngredients
ORDER BY TotalIngredients DESC
LIMIT 10

MATCH (n:`Cuisine`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Top Ingredients in Selected Cuisine
reports.query:
MATCH (c:Cuisine)
WHERE toLower(c.name) = toLower($neodash_cuisine_name)
MATCH (c)-[:HAS_DISH]->(:Dish)-[:USES]->(i:Ingredient)
RETURN i.name AS Ingredient, COUNT(*) AS Frequency
ORDER BY Frequency DESC
LIMIT 10;

reports.title: üçΩÔ∏è Cuisine Summary Dashboard
reports.query:
MATCH (c:Cuisine)
WHERE toLower(c.name) = toLower($neodash_cuisine_name)
OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_DISH]->(d:Dish)
OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:USES]->(i:Ingredient)
OPTIONAL MATCH (i)-[:ASSOCIATED_WITH]->(b:Brand)
RETURN 
  toUpper(c.name) AS Cuisine,
  "üçΩÔ∏è " + toString(COUNT(DISTINCT d)) AS Total_Dishes,
  "ü•¶ " + toString(COUNT(DISTINCT i)) AS Total_Ingredients,
  "üè∑Ô∏è " + toString(COUNT(DISTINCT b)) AS Total_Brands

reports.title: üåç Global Dataset Summary
reports.query:
CALL apoc.meta.stats() YIELD labels, relTypesCount
RETURN
  "üåç " + toString(labels.Cuisine) AS Total_Cuisines,
  "üçΩÔ∏è " + toString(labels.Dish) AS Total_Dishes,
  "ü•¶ " + toString(labels.Ingredient) AS Total_Ingredients,
  "üè∑Ô∏è " + toString(labels.Brand) AS Total_Brands

reports.title: Number of Dishes per Cuisine
reports.query:
MATCH (c:Cuisine)-[:HAS_DISH]->(d:Dish)
RETURN c.name AS Cuisine, COUNT(DISTINCT d) AS TotalDishes
ORDER BY TotalDishes DESC
LIMIT 10
